en.start: Hello! Please send your phone number (for example, +998901234567).
en.phone_check: Your phone number has been accepted: {}. Please send the verification code you received from Telegram.
en.code_error: The verification code is incorrect. Please try again.

uz.start: Assalomu alaykum! Iltimos, telefon raqamingizni yuboring (masalan, +998901234567).
uz.phone_check: Telefon raqamingiz qabul qilindi: {}. Iltimos, Telegramdan kelgan tasdiqlash kodini yuboring.
uz.code_error: Tasdiqlash kodi noto'g'ri. Iltimos, qaytadan urinib ko'ring.
uz.code_success: Tasdiqlash muvaffaqiyatli amalga oshirildi. Session yaratildi.
